name: Vitale #37
description: Your 0.62 carat Fancy Vivid Yellowish Orange diamond is rare, with only 1 in 400,000 diamonds with similar characteristics. The Vivid designation indicates an exceptional intensity and saturation of colour. The orange and yellow hues of your diamond attest the presence of nitrogen atoms that absorb blue light and create a yellow tint, combined with red luminescence. A flame captured in crystalline form, this unique colour is associated with warmth and vitality. A mere 4 to 7 similar diamonds enter the market yearly.

attributes.value: Fancy Vivid Yellowish Orange Natural Color
